title: Great Canal Journeys: Series 1-5 Boxset [DVD]
description: The inspirational Timothy West and Prunella Scales embark on their waterway adventures & spectacular canal journeys across Britain and abroad.

Collected for the first time, Great Canal Journeys will be available as a 5-disc DVD set. Pru and Tim embark on remarkable canal journeys, sharing a passion that theyve enjoyed for decades. From the Norfolk Broads to Kerela, India; Great Canal Journeys is a truly international affair.
'Prunella Scales and Timothy Wests meandering canal adventures are a balm to lifes brutality'
'A programme that remains so soothing its like taking televisual Buttercup Syrup'
'This was perhaps TV's loveliest hour for a while, and one with a moral'
Includes subtitles for the Hard Of Hearing
